TypeSignature.Value: .class public interface auto ansi abstract IRemoteArgumentEnumerableContract implements class System.AddIn.Contract.IContract

Docs.summary: Exposes an enumerator that supports a simple iteration over a collection of objects.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance class System.AddIn.Contract.Collections.IRemoteArgumentEnumeratorContract GetEnumeratorContract() cil managed

Docs.summary: Returns an enumerator that can be used to iterate through the collection.
Docs.returns: An that can be used to iterate through the collection.

remarks.format: ## Remarks Enumerators can be used to read the data in the collection, but they cannot be used to modify the underlying collection.
